GetFraction.description:
DNUMBERWANG [Client] Returns a fraction representing the current number selector value to number selector min/max range ratio. If argument val is supplied, that number will be computed instead.

[number] val
  The fraction numerator.

OnValueChanged.description:
DNUMBERWANG [Client] Internal function which is called when the number selector value is changed. This function is empty by default so it needs to be overridden in order to provide functionality.

[number] val
  The new value of the number selector.

SetDecimals.description:
DNUMBERWANG [Client] Sets the amount of decimal places allowed in the number selector.

[number] num
  The amount of decimal places.

SetFraction.description:
DNUMBERWANG [Client] Sets the value of the number selector based on the given fraction number.

[number] val
  The fraction of the number selector's range.

SetMinMax.description:
DNUMBERWANG [Client] 

[number] min
  The minimum value.

[number] max
  The maximum value.

SetValue.description:
DNUMBERWANG [Client] 

[number] val
  The value to set.
